entry.title: El Gatito Tee
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dufer
Type: Oct Style
Price: 24.00

"El Gatito" by Dufer

• 100% combed and ring-spun cotton (heather colors contain polyester)
• Fabric weight: 4.2 oz (142 g/m2)
• Shoulder-to-shoulder taping
• Side-seamed

entry.title: Comuna 13 Tank
entry.summary:
Vendor: Juliana & Camilo
Type: Sep Style
Price: 26.40

One of our original choices for a company logo. The design was so awesome that we needed to have it in our lineup. Based on an actual scene in Comuna 13 by Juliana and Camilo.

Whether it's beating the heat or an extra layer, add a little extra to your wardrobe.


• 100% fine jersey (heather colors contain 10% polyester)
• Banded arm and head holes
• Made in the USA, sweatshop free

Size guide

  XS S M L XL
Chest (inches) 30-32 34-36 38-40 42-44 46-48
Waist (inches) 28-30 30-32 32-33 33-34 36-38

entry.title: Comuna 13 Tee
entry.summary:
Vendor: Juliana & Camilo
Type: Sep Style
Price: 28.00

One of our original choices for a company logo. The design was so awesome that we needed to have it in our lineup.Based on an actual scene in Comuna 13 by Juliana and Camilo.

The durable tri-blend fabric creates a vintage, fitted look.

• Tri-blend construction (50% polyester/25% combed ring-spun cotton/25% rayon)
• 40 singles thread weight
• Comfortable and durable
• Contemporary fit
• Lightweight

Size Chart

  XS S M L XL 2XL
Length (inches) 27 28 29 30 31 32
Width (inches) 16 ½ 18 20 22 24 26
